Chop Shop: (GASP!) Wouldn't that make me a dung beetle? I don't know, it'd =
be pretty cool, actually.

Barrage was hit by a shot from the base. He tota=
lly ignored Apocalypse and aimed a gun at the shields. He was hit by anothe=
r shot, but then fired 2 missiles at the base. Ransack holds his hand out a=
nd a charge comes out of his wrist. He pressed a button as it lands in his =
hand, and then throws it at the base. It's set to explode when the timer ti=
cks down. Venom was hit by 3 shots from the base and gasps.

Bombshell: Hee=
 hee hee! What should I make her do? Dance!

He sends out a signal to the s=
hell in Periwinkle's head to make her dance...

  ----- Original Message --=
--- 
  From: *Orchid* 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, Febr=
uary 16, 2002 3:51 AM
  Subject: Re: Insecticons. Can you dig it, Chivtrons=
?...


  OOC: Damn it! Who controls the base? Cause whoever does, reply to =
my attacks! I'm tired of being ignored! And yet everything seems to go on v=
ery casually. Why? Cause I'm not popular like Airly? And Airly, it is McGow=
an's team! Not Barrymore! And it's Barrymore with an I...

  IC:

  Periwin=
kle stops struggling and stares into space after the cerebro shell was inse=
rted in her head. She was now Bombshell's slave...

  McGowan swiftly dodge=
s the autoguns shots. Virgo, Birdbot and Papertron are struck by the severa=
l shots but hold their ground. On the other hand, Barrymore, Lee and Depp d=
odged the shots. Barrymore with a sidejump, Lee with and duck & roll and De=
pp with a high jump. She remembered that although Pink was dead, they still=
 had Brown.

  McGowan: I hope you Shitrons know that there is going to be =
another death over here! Your precious little Shitron is about to suffer!

=
  Depp passes Brown to McGowan. McGowan first watches Virgo fire off 8 shot=
s, Barrymore fire off 6 shots, Lee fire off 2 fireballs, Depp fire off 4 pl=
asma shots, Birdbot fire 2 more grenades and Papertron fire off 10 shots. M=
cGowan smiled, watching all of the shots go sailing towards the Chivtron ba=
se. McGowan turns to the Insecticons.

  McGowan: Hey, if someone doesn't c=
ome out soon, would you mind eating this guy?

  Brown eyes widened and hop=
ed that the Insecticons would do something less brutal...

    ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
    From: Airshadow Nightlight 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroup=
s.com 
    Sent: Saturday, February 16, 2002 1:50 AM
    Subject: Re: Insec=
ticons. Can you dig it, Chivtrons?...


    OOC: Regarding Rudra's ooc's po=
st I'll post with Aerotaur. 

    Windlord/Aerotaur/Nightlight::: 

    "St=
op little one!!" said Aerotaur while he took at Trinity and left her in Nig=
htlight's arms. 

    "But I wanna help, uncle Aerotaur"said Trinity. 

   =
 "No yet"replied Aerotaur  who turned on the base's defences. 

    The ext=
ernal defences turned on and fired against the Insecticons and Barrimore's =
team.
